com.hypirion.io
Class ClosingPipe

java.lang.Object
  com.hypirion.io.Pipe
      com.hypirion.io.ClosingPipe

public class ClosingPipe
extends Pipe

A ClosingPipe is a link between an input stream and an output stream or a reader or writer: The pipe, once started, will asynchronously redirect all data received from the input source to the output source until it is paused, stopped or the input source is empty. When the input source has been closed, or the pipe has been stopped, a ClosingPipe will close the output source afterwards. Common usage of pipes includes asynchronous zipping of data from two data sources, redirecting output and input to subprocesses and for loggers you want to just pipe from and input source.

Since:
com.hypirion.io 0.2.0
